EmailTemplate.name: Contact Role Status Changed
EmailTemplate.subject: GADM User access change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name}{!Receiving_User.Name},
Role “{!Contact_Role_Service_Access__c.Contact_Roles_Name__c}” status has been changed to {!Contact_Role_Service_Access__c.Status__c}.
Please note that the role of “{!Contact_Role_Service_Access__c.Contact_Roles_Name__c}” for {!Contact_Role_Service_Access__c.Contact__c} to GADM Service for {!Contact_Role_Service_Access__c.Account__c} *tense* {!Contact_Role_Service_Access__c.Status__c}. For a full explanation of user roles and permission, please refer to the Program Operations Manual.
GADM Team gadm@iata.org
